general_info.summary: This text introduces "Paramarsh" as a mentoring portal.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths after a course, specifically mentioning Regulatory Affairs Officer and Biotechnology Researcher. It also highlights that students in this program typically receive an average annual salary package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in basic sciences.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Regulatory Affairs Officer
• Biotechnology Researcher
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.

recruiters.summary: The provided text consists of a heading "Our Recruiters" followed by a bulleted list that repeats "Our Recruiters" and "Recruiters". The content is very minimal and repetitive, essentially just reiterating the title.

admission_info.summary: This text appears to be a simple title and navigation breadcrumb, indicating "SUAT 2025" as a main topic, with "Sample Papers" listed as both a sub-category and a link.
